original_text: We have been with child, we have been in pain, we have as it were brought forth wind; we have not wrought any deliverance in the earth; neither have the inhabitants of the world fallen.
korean_text: 우리가 잉태하고 산고를 당하였을지라도 바람을 낳은 것 같아서 땅에 구원을 베풀지 못하였고 세계의 거민을 출산하지 못하였나이다

sentences.original_text: we have as it were brought forth wind
we have not wrought any deliverance in the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 땅에서 어떤 구원도 이루지 못했다

sentences.original_text: neither have inhabitants of world fallen
